short_summary: Evaluation Services Consultants to conduct a Joint Evaluation and Audit assessing progress in advancing reconciliation efforts with Indigenous Peoples, covering governance, policy engagement, programs, and workforce actions.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Title
Evaluation and Audit of Advancing Reconciliation at Natural Resources Canada
(French): Évaluation et Audit de l'avancement de la réconciliation à Ressources Naturelles Canada


## Details
### Tender Information
* Solicitation Number: NRCan-5000074372
* Tender Reference Number: cb-859-79736988
* Amendment Number: 4
* Tender Closing Date: **Please note that the tender has expired**
* Publication Date: 2024-03-11
* Contact Information:
	+ Alexandre Rheault, Contracting Authority
	+ Phone: (613) 298-6447
	+ Email: alexandre.rheault@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca

### Tender Description
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking a consultant to conduct a joint evaluation and audit assessing progress in advancing reconciliation efforts with Indigenous Peoples. This will cover governance, policy engagement, programs, and workforce actions.

### Requirements
* The consultant must be a Supply Arrangement Holder under E60ZT-16TSSB.
* The consultant must qualify for Tier 1 under the stated consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise.
* The consultant must be a member of the listed joint venture, NATTIQ Inc., Vision XRM Inc., and XRM Vision Inc.
* The consultant must have a minimum security level of Protected B and hold a Reliability security level for resources.

### Application
Tender documents are available on NRCAN-RNCan.GC.CA.

### Estimated Timeline
* The contract will be for a period of one (1) year from the date of contract award.
* The estimated level of effort will be detailed in the RFP documents.

### Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA), and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA). 

Please note that the tender has been closed, and no further submissions will be accepted. The contract has been awarded.  End of Tender Announcement.
